article.title: U.S. Export Assistance Center in Mississippi Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Center in Mississippi.
article.content:
​

Mississippi Office Contact Information

Mississippi U.S. Export Assistance Center
1230 Raymond Road, Box 600
Jackson, MS 39204
Ph: 601-373-0773
Fax: 601-373-0959
Email:Carol.Moore@trade.gov
Website: http://www.export.gov/mississippi​

Mississippi Staff

Ms. Carol Moore, USEAC Director
Ph: (601) 373-0773
Fax: (601) 373-0959
Email:Carol.Moore@trade.gov

Mr. Glenn Ferreri, International Trade Specialist
Ph: (601) 373-0849
Fax: (601) 373-0959
Email:Glenn.Ferreri@trade.gov

Ms. Jessica Gordon, International Trade Specialist
Ph: (601) 373-0784
Fax: (601) 373-0959
Email:http://informationportalprodmailto:Jessica.Gordon@trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30​am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Center in Mississippi.
